document_data.name: Haramettur
document_data.Description: The town had a temple to [[Mystra]], known as [[Mystra's Mantle]].
document_data.History: The sage [[Tabarast]] had been to Mystra's Mantle in Haramettur sometime in the {{yearlinkName|761}}, where he learned that [[Elminster Aumar|the One Who Walks]], a [[Chosen of Mystra]], was to be left alone and his identity left unacknowledged by the faithful of Mystra per her divine orders.
